actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

official_title: To repeal the per-State limitation applicable to grants made by the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for fiscal year 2005.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Amends general provisions (title III) of the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2005 (which is division E of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2005, Public Law 108-447) to repeal a limitation on the portion of National Endowment for the Arts grant funds which may be made available to any single State.

titles.title: To repeal the per-State limitation applicable to grants made by the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for fiscal year 2005.
